name: universal-cache-scripts
description: Add these scripts to ANY project's package.json

scripts.build:production: npm run clean && npm run build:cache-bust
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf build dist node_modules/.cache ~/.npm/_cacache && npm cache clean --force
scripts.deploy:verify: node -e "console.log('ðŸš€ Build Info:', {buildTime: process.env.REACT_APP_BUILD_TIME, commit: process.env.REACT_APP_COMMIT_HASH, cacheBust: process.env.REACT_APP_CACHE_BUST})"
scripts.cache:status: echo 'Cache Status:' && ls -la build/static/js/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'No build found'
